general_advisory: Sow wheat and rice early this season. Keep a check on cattle and poultry health.

advisory: Sow wheat early in well-drained soil.
Apply fertilizers rich in nitrogen for better growth.
Transplant rice seedlings in flooded fields.
Control weeds to prevent nutrient competition.
Provide clean water and adequate feed to cattle.
Ensure shelter from extreme weather conditions.
Maintain proper hygiene in poultry houses.
Monitor for any signs of disease and take immediate action.
